robspackfilter 0.6.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Generates YAML and write data.frame

Source: R/helpers.R
obs_write.Rd

Add YAML header info and writes a the data.frame into disk. The YAML section includes notes and str(dt).

obs_write(
  dt,
  notes,
  out = paste0(tempfile(), ".csvy"),
  sep = ",",
  nchar.max = 80,
  ...
)

Arguments

dt

data.table

notes

notes.

out

outfile path.

sep

The separator between columns. Default is ",".

nchar.max

Max nchar for str.

...

extra data.table arguments

See also

Other helpers: obs_addltime(), obs_footname(), obs_format(), obs_freq(), obs_list.dt(), obs_out(), obs_rbind(), obs_read_csvy(), obs_roundtime(), obs_trunc(), robspackfilter-deprecated

Examples

{
df <- data.frame(a = rnorm(n = 10),
                 time = Sys.time() + 1:10)

f <- paste0(tempfile(), ".csvy")
notes <- c("notes",
           "more notes")
obs_write(dt = df, notes = notes, out = f)
readLines(f)
data.table::fread(f)
}
#>                a                time
#>  1:  0.007983811 2023-04-07 22:28:56
#>  2: -1.564894898 2023-04-07 22:28:57
#>  3:  1.022091382 2023-04-07 22:28:58
#>  4: -1.078248052 2023-04-07 22:28:59
#>  5:  1.231245674 2023-04-07 22:29:00
#>  6:  0.286042624 2023-04-07 22:29:01
#>  7: -0.112601186 2023-04-07 22:29:02
#>  8:  0.260789026 2023-04-07 22:29:03
#>  9:  0.115410916 2023-04-07 22:29:04
#> 10:  0.408584163 2023-04-07 22:29:05
